column1: Plastic Product Alternatives: Easy Ways to go Zero-Waste!
column5: No Tox Life Dish Washing Block Soap
column7:
• A CLEANING POWERHOUSE – Get your dishes clean with DISH BLOCK from NO TOX LIFE, the ultra-concentrated Vegan Dish Bar Soap that lathers up and cuts stubborn food, grime and grease on dishes, pots and pans. Includes 1 x 6 oz solid dish soap bar.

• IT'S FOAM-TASTIC – Experience the rich, sudsy lather...a little goes a long way. It’s an effective and easy-to-use dish soap that cleans in all water types, including hard water and cold water. No residue, long-lasting and septic safe -- enjoy our new 2021 formula!

• DISH BLOCK THE BOTTLE – The ZERO WASTE DISH WASHING BLOCK is a plastic-free, palm oil-free and biodegradable alternative to plastic bottle dish soap. This ecofriendly soap helps you reduce your kitchen plastic consumption without compromising on results.

• SAFE FOR YOUR SKIN – Do you get dry, cracked skin from other dish soaps? Our unscented dish soap is made without fragrance, dyes or Methylisothiazolinone, an ideal choice for skin that’s sensitive to harsh chemicals. This Vegan dish soap is Phosphate-free, Sulfate-free, Paraben-free and Cruelty-free.

• ABOUT US – Formulated and manufactured by a Mother + Daughter team who only make and sell Vegan products that are ethically manufactured in a USA-based solar power facility. Please note that any pictured soap brush or dish caddy is not included and must be purchased separately.
column10: The first easy change you can make is by finding plastic alternatives for your home life. There is a surprising amount of single-use plastic used for household items such as laundry detergent, dish soap, and trash bags. Instead, use oragnic iquid dish soap: Lots of zero-waste shops now offer a refill section for dish soap and detergent. You can even buy a special eco-friendly soap to wash your dishes

column10: Put your leftover food in the fridge in glass containers, rather than covering it in plastic wrap. You can also buy silicone food covers like these.

column1: Plastic Product Alternatives: Easy Ways to go Zero-Waste!
column5: Lowe's 30 Gallon Heavy Duty Brown Paper Lawn and Refuse Bags for Home and Garden (10 Count)
column7:
Maintaining your home is a year-round ordeal. As long as there is waste around your lawn or patio in the summer, fall, winter, or springtime, you’ll need waste bags. These Lowe’s waste bags do the job right. Compact when not in use, just open these two-ply paper bags up all the way and they can stand by themselves for as long as the job goes on. They hold up to 30 gallons of waste, so with this 10 pack you have 300 gallons to work with. These bags are biodegradable, too, so they can decompose along with your compost. Wet refuse, dry refuse, this bag can take just about all of it. Give it a try, you will not be disappointed. Lowe’s does it better.

• Country Of Origin : United States

• Dimensions: 16-Inch Length X 12 Inch Width X 35 Inch Height

• These Bags Are Biodegradable, Too, So They Can Decompose Along With Your Compost

• They Hold Up To 300 Gallons Of Waste
column10: Use newspaper to line your bin, buy biodegradable trash bags, or don’t use trash bags at all. Do not add any food waste in the biodegradable trash bags, as they will dissolve faster. Instead, separate your food compost in a smaller bin without a trash bag that you can easily empty and clean after a few days.

column5: Reusable Produce Bags for Grocery Shopping
column7:
True Natured Co. Reusable Bag Set is designed for the eco-conscious consumer who values sustainability and plastic free living. We are committed to designing reusable products for a sustainable world.

✓ Our reusable produce and bulk bin drawstring bags are the perfect Farmers Market Bag set. The 7 piece set includes: (1) Large reusable net grocery shopping bag, (3) reusable mesh produce bags: 8"x11", 11"x13" & 11"x17" (3) reusable bulk bin food bags: 8"x11", 11"x13" & 11"x17"

✓ 100% Biodegradable - Our natural cotton and muslin drawstring bags w/wooden closures are completely biodegradable.

✓Most reusable produce bags you see on the market are made from synthetic (petroleum-based), polyester material; our bags AND packaging are 100% plastic-free!

✓Durable and designed to last - Our double stitched seams are built to last

✓SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We value your commitment to our planet and hope you will love our product, if not, it’s on us! REUSABLE = SUSTAINABLE WORLD! Nearly 2 million single-use plastic bags are distributed globally every minute. Your purchase is part of the solution. Thank you!
column10: Bring shopping bags and nets to hold your fresh food, like this one. This stops you from having to use plastic shopping bags at checkout and at the bread/veggie/fruits section.

If you wash only a few pieces, hand washing is also very easy. Are the pads two-sided or one-sided? Minasuki reusable makeup remover pads are made of double-sided bamboo cotton, which is soft and gentle and has strong makeup removal ability. Is it convenient to carry? Experience the exotic scents and creamy lather of our body soaps. Specially crafted to gently cleanse and nourish your skin. Why Us? We believe that incorporating natural soap into your daily routine can make a significant difference. Our soap is crafted with care using high-quality, natural ingredients that nourish your skin gently. We prioritize sustainability and ethical practices, ensuring that our products are sustainable and cruelty-free. With a wide range of invigorating scents and beneficial properties, savor the indulgent pleasure of our natural soap. Visit the Store Find your signature scent and pamper your skin with our luxurious soap bars. Discover the ultimate indulgence in every wash. Visit the Store Experience nature's luxury with our Natural Soap. Elevate your skincare routine and enjoy the trending clean beauty benefits. Visit the Store Escape to a daily spa-like experience with our handmade tropical-scented soap bars, indulging your skin with a luxurious lather. We love creating natural, high-quality soap bars that improve lives. Crafting luxurious products and promoting sustainable living is our passion. Seeing our customers enjoy our products and feel good about using them is incredibly rewarding. Our handmade tropical-scented soap bars are unique because we use only the finest natural ingredients and traditional crafting methods, carefully sourcing from sustainable, ethical sources. Each bar is crafted by hand in small batches and free from harmful chemicals and preservatives. Bali Soap offers one of its most popular products, the 6-Piece Natural Soap Collection, which features all-natural, handmade soap bars that cater to men and women. The soaps are made using the cold process soap making method, ensuring that all the natural ingredients are preserved in each bar. These soaps are specially crafted with botanicals from the Indonesian archipelago that make them stand out from other soaps on the market. The Bali Soap 6-Piece Natural Soap Collection is designed to provide you with a unique and luxurious experience. Each bar is naturally textured to suit different skin types and needs. You can choose from smooth to lightly exfoliating, or even opt for one or two bars with extra grit to scrub your skin thoroughly. The unique textures of each bar are a result of the cold press soap making method employed, which produces natural glycerin as a by-product. Unlike other soaps on the market today, Bali Soap does not remove this glycerin from their soaps. If you have sensitive or dry skin, Bali Soap's 6-Piece Natural Soap Collection is gentle enough to use all over. The soap's all-natural base oils provide a healthy lather that cleanses and leaves your skin feeling moisturized. Whether you're looking to pamper yourself or looking for an ideal gift for a loved one, these exquisitely formulated soaps showcase Bali Soap's commitment to creating top-quality all-natural skincare products. Use them directly on the skin, as a luxurious addition to a relaxing bath, or as a decorative touch to your guest bathroom or vanity.     Natural Bar Soap For Her and Him   Luxurious and all-natural experience that Bali Soap offers for both men and women, with its assortment of indulgent, fancy, exfoliating bars that nourish the skin and delight the senses. Experience the benefits of Bali Soap's variety pack, which includes six of the best ultra-nourishing and moisturizing bars that gently cleanse and exfoliate the skin. Each bar of soap is meticulously wrapped, ensuring they remain fresh and ready-to-use for as long as possible.

• EXOTIC NATURAL SOAP FROM BALI - Long lasting bars that rinse off clean and leaves no soap residue behind. Natural glycerin promotes extra moisturizing which helps to prevent dry skin

• TEXTURED WITH NATURAL ISLAND BOTANICALS - An exotic blend of organic ingredients which results in an invigorating exfoliating scrub combined with a creamy lather

• VARIETY / GIFT PACK - 6 individually wrapped bars in a stylish gift box perfect for your home, wedding favors, office gifts, bridal showers, graduation or practically any gift giving occasion

• 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Everyone has their own personal tastes, senses and preferences, and that's ok so if for any reason you are not happy with our soaps then you are welcome to return them for a full refund

• Never tested on animals
column10: Buy your shampoo/conditioner/soap in bars that come in reusable tins or compostable packaging. The bars last longer than regular shampoo, giving you more washes. column7:
Each jar contains 90 generously sized toothpaste tablets made with all-natural ingredients. Made with calcium bentonite clay to help whiten your teeth naturally and natural flavor to freshen your breath. Ecofam toothpaste tablets are a sustainable, fun, and easy way to brush your teeth! Available Flavors: Vanilla Mint, Peppermint, Strawberry Kiwi, Bubblegum, Cinnamon, and Wintergreen. EcoFam toothpaste features a chewable, waterless design that allows you to brush your teeth anywhere, anytime, without carrying bulky toothpaste tubes. To use, place one tablet in your mouth and crush it with your teeth. Wet your toothbrush and brush your teeth for about 2 minutes. The paste will foam slightly as you begin to brush. Rinse thoroughly and enjoy your bright, healthy smile! We created Compact by Design to identify products that, while they may not always look very different, have a more efficient design. With the removal of excess air and water, products require less packaging and become more efficient to ship. At scale, these small differences in product size and weight lead to significant carbon emission reductions.

• Each jar contains 90 generously sized toothpaste tablets made with all-natural ingredients. Made with calcium bentonite clay to help whiten your teeth naturally and natural flavor to freshen your breath. We also include Nano Hydroxyapatite and Xylitol as a dentist recommended ingredient..

• Perfect and easy to use while traveling. Also Ideal for Camping and outdoor adventures. Bite on Toothpaste tablet to crush in your mouth and brush your teeth with a wet toothbrush.

• Contains zero plastic! Our toothpaste tablets are packaged in an eco friendly glass jar that can be reused or refilled or recycled and eliminate extra packaging waste.

• Made in the USA. Vegan-friendly and never tested on animals.
column10:
If you use a disposable toothbrush, you’re throwing this plastic away every time you need a new brush. Consider buying a biodegradable bamboo toothbrush. If you have an electric sonic toothbrush, you can find brush attachments that are bamboo instead of plastic.

For toothpaste make the switch to toothpaste tablets to save on (a lot of) plastic!

column7:
You’ve never met a team that cares more about your period! We think you’ll love it–you'll probably wonder how you ever lived without it! We promise to share every tip and trick up our sleeves to help you get to period bliss. Reach out for personalized help. The Saalt Cup is the perfect starter cup to simplify and improve your period. We designed the Saalt Cup to be a premium cup with multiple seal points to prevent leaks and a soft flex stem for ultra comfort. This naturally hypoallergenic and toxin-free Saalt Cup can last up to 10 years, diverting waste from landfills and saving you money! Plus your purchase helps provide period care to women and girls in need. Thank you for (period) caring!

• Reusable - Break up with the tampon aisle- forever. One Saalt Cup lasts for up to 10 years. That's more than 120 periods and replaces over 3,000 tampons and tons of waste. You don't have to work on Wall Street to recognize a great deal. Save your wallet, and your environment.

• Reliable - The OG of Cups - Wear your Saalt Cup for to 12 hours at a time, even while you're sleeping, or running a marathon, or flying to London. No matching your flow to different absorbencies or emergency tampon runs. This little menstrual cup collects as much as 3-4 tampons and never dries you out so you can have a worry free period.

• Comfortable - Saalt Cup is impossibly soft and flexible. The proprietary bulb shape makes it the easiest cup to insert and open, ensuring a seal so comfortable that you forget it's there. It also means you have a consistent leak free and odor free period. The indented stem is the most flexible and comfortable on the market. No abrasive ridges to irritate your skin.

• Natural and Safe- Made in the USA with 100% medical-grade silicone, the Saalt Cup is affordable premium period care. Our cup is naturally hypoallergenic, non-toxic and BPA and latex free. Unlike tampons it maintains your unique pH and will never dry you out, leave fibrous residue or cause micro tearing which can increase the risk of infection and TSS.

• Saalt Gives - For every purchase, Saalt helps provide improved period care and educational opportunities to women and girls in need. So your Saalt Cup is good for you and for her.
column10: Menstruation products contribute a huge amount to plastic waste with their plastic lining and packaging. A reusable moon cup is a great alternative to help reduce plastic. With proper care, they can last up to 10 years! (Shop a menstrual cup)

column1: Plastic Product Alternatives: Easy Ways to go Zero-Waste!
column5: Ethique Rustic Citrus & Earthy Deodorant Bar for Men & Women
column7: Our Story Brianne West, CEO & Founder, started Ethique in her kitchen in 2012 when she began experimenting with solid shampoo bars. Today we have over 100 products in our range! Our Products We create conscious & concentrated haircare, skincare, body care & more products to help make giving up the bottle easier. All our products are 100% plastic-free, certified vegan, cruelty-free & palm-oil free. Also, our packaging is 100% plastic-free. Visit the Store Visit the Store Visit the Store We’re on a mission to revolutionize the cosmetics industry and regenerate our planet through business. Helping to rid the world of single-use plastic bottles is just one part of that! As of 2021, we have saved over 20+ million single-use plastic bottles from being made or disposed of in landfills around the world, over 3 million gallons of water from being wasted and have planted over 350,000 trees. This is only the beginning! We started our revolution in 2012 when our founder, Brianne, began making natural beauty bars, in her kitchen, as an alternative to the 80 billion plastic shampoo and conditioner bottles thrown out globally each year. Since then, Ethique has grown out of a Kiwi kitchen into a fully-fledged, award-winning International beauty brand. We're conquering the beauty world one bar at a time. Today, we've stopped over 3,400,000 plastic bottles ending up in landfills - and that's just the start of it...
column10: The gases in aerosols and its plastic packaging are extremely harmful to the environment. Find the perfect plastic-free alternatives in a solid deodorant block made from natural ingredients that you simply rub under your arms!

column5: Active Natural Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 – Suntribe ®
column7:
100% NATURAL SUNSCREEN | Safe for you and nature. Finally a worry-free sunscreen, packaged in an eco-friendly sugar cane tube. 

HIGH PERFORMANCE SUN PROTECTION | Very water resistant and sweat resistant. Stays on in both big waves and sweaty activities on land. 

WHITE SHIMMER | The innovative combination of mineral UV-filters and Pongamia Glabra Seed Oil reduces the whitening effect of this sunscreen on the skin.

ORGANIC & GENTLE | Smooth vegan sunscreen with soothing Aloe Vera and calming Chamomile. Allergen-free and suitable for kids and sensitive skin. Mild scent without perfume.

MINERAL UV-FILTERS | Scientifically validated broad spectrum protection against UVA & UVB thanks to Non-Nano Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide. Reef safe.
column10:
Use a reef-safe sunscreen. A lot of sunscreens contain microplastics, as well as ingredients that cause damage to sea life and coral. What’s more, these microplastic can actually be absorbed into your skin which is bad for your health. A plastic alternative to regular sunscreen is a reef-safe sunscreen, made from natural ingredients, that comes in compostable packaging or a reusable tin.

Suntribe has a range of ‘non-nano Zinc Oxide’ reef-safe sunscreens. They also contain organic coconut oil to help moisturize the skin. The Suntribe sunscreen is sold in a tube made from sugar cane which is fully recyclable. Available at Suntribe. (Use ‘SaltinourHair’ at checkout to get 10% off!)
column12: Get 10% discount at Suntribe, only for Salt in our Hair readers! – Use the code ‘SaltinourHair’ at checkout.
